entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
